0: What is the specific section of the United States Code that the text references regarding copyright protection?

Based solely on the reference material provided, the specific section of the United States Code that the text references regarding copyright protection is:

Title 17, Section 105 of the United States Code.
What is the name of the Congress being referred to in the text?
Based solely on the reference material provided, the name of the Congress being referred to is the "118th Congress."
Who are the individuals authorized to notify Members of the House and Senate to assemble outside the District of Columbia, according to the text?

Based solely on the reference material provided, the individuals authorized to notify Members of the House and Senate to assemble outside the District of Columbia are:

1. The Speaker of the House of Representatives
2. The Majority Leader of the Senate
3. Their respective designees

This information can be found in the text of H. CON. RES. 1, specifically in clause 4, section 5, article I of the Constitution.
What is the date on which H. CON. RES. 1 was passed by the House of Representatives, according to the text?

Based solely on the reference material provided, H. CON. RES. 1 was passed by the House of Representatives on January 9, 2023. This information can be found in the text of the resolution as follows: "Passed the House of Representatives January 9, 2023."
